info.description: This is the API server for Fivemanage, providing endpoints for media management, logging, and SDK integration.
info.title: Fivemanage API

post.description: Upload an audio file with optional metadata

delete.description: Delete a specific audio file by ID

get.description: Get details of a specific audio file by ID

post.description: Upload an image file with optional metadata

delete.description: Delete a specific image by ID

get.description: Get details of a specific image by ID

post.description: Submit one or more log entries
Submit one or more log entries

get.description: Generate a presigned URL for file upload

post.description: Upload a file using a presigned URL token
Send a heartbeat to keep the SDK token alive

404.description: Not found - token not found or already invalidated

post.description: Generate an SDK token for reporting
Upload an audio file with optional metadata
Upload an image file with optional metadata

get.description: Generate a presigned URL for file upload

post.description: Upload a file using a presigned URL token
Upload a video file with optional metadata
Upload a video file with optional metadata

delete.description: Delete a specific video by ID

get.description: Get details of a specific video by ID
